website_summaries.verdict: Regulation-size bocce balls included in a set that has everything you need to begin playing immediately.
pros: Uses high-quality materials in the bocce balls, so you can be sure they'll last
Includes both square-cut and circle-cut balls
Equipment works equally well on a bocce ball court or in free-play bocce
Entire set fits in a canvas carrying bag for easy transport
cons: Balls may show scratches and chips if they strike hard objects

customer_reviews.title: Stop lying! You just wasted my time.
customer_reviews.text: These bocce balls are about 5mm smaller than the listed 100mm. Why does this matter? REGULATION size bocce balls are 100mm-115mm with a STANDARD size of 107mm. They are advertising regulation size balls and they are selling mere toys. Lying about your product is costing me time, and causing me to miss out on a scheduled play time I set up with buddies. Now we'll have to reschedule and wait even longer to play. First world problems, I know, but still annoying AF.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn H.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for both style and quality
customer_reviews.text: I come from an Italian family where we take bocce ball very seriously (not as seriously as we take meat balls, but pretty close). Anyway, I have high bocce standards and there are a lot of crappy sets out there. This set is perfect regulation size and weight- no complaints from my old school uncles who've been playing for half a century. The carrying case has nice dividers to keep the balls in place, but it's also flexible so it's easy to carry. Overall great in both style and quality - a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Chipped ball early in life
customer_reviews.text: The set is great overall, but one of the balls chipped very badly only the 2nd day we ever used them on the beach. I have another set that I have used for many years on the beach without issue, so this set was purchased so that we no longer have to lug them to the beach. Great set, but chipped very badly early in it's life.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Broke first use - not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a father's day weekend lazy game surprise and they broke on the first day, second game. I can't believe that you can even break a bocce ball. (Photos attached). Wanted to return but I made the mistake of ordering more than 30 days ahead of the holiday, be warned. Hopefully the company reads this and sends a replacement. Will update if I hear anything back.
customer_reviews.author: andrew e.

customer_reviews.title: The case is really nice and holds the weight of the set well
customer_reviews.text: The case is really nice and holds the weight of the set well. The set is quite heavy, so that's saying something for a cloth bag. The bag has nice padding and separators for each ball. We used this in the Texas hill country where there were bits of limestone all over the yard we played in. The balls took the abuse well and only suffered minor cosmetic damage even with hitting pretty solidly on rock several times. I think if these were used in a normal suburban yard or a beach or pretty much anywhere without rocks, they wouldn't even suffer cosmetic damage. I am very happy with the quality of the set!
customer_reviews.author: KarenTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: If you need a set of Bocce balls, buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the money. Why spend any more? Heavy canvas carrying bag, with divided compartments, with both handle and shoulder strap makes hauling easy. Game rules included.
customer_reviews.author: baitmaster

customer_reviews.title: SOLID Bocce ball set.
customer_reviews.text: SOLID Bocce ball set. Balls have a great weight and the bag is made of quality material. There is really nothing comparable at this price. We expect it to provide years of fun, and is certainly a favorite among the older kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: DDC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Special Olympics Champion
customer_reviews.text: My daughter participates in Special Olympics and we needed a set identical to the set they use at her school and in competition so this set was everything we had hoped for. Great packaging fast shipping and quality items. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: S & S

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in a timely manner and didn't seem to have excessive packaging. I was disappointed to find the set was advertised as "regulation" size 100mm when they arrived they were only 95mm and the jack was Way smaller than any other jack I had ever played with.. Most are nearly the size of a cue ball, but this one was a tiny bit bigger than a ping pong ball. It's got a good feel to the balls, just feel too small in my hand..
customer_reviews.author: M.Priest

customer_reviews.title: Great product from a great company!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, if you were going to buy any type of lawn game, GoSport's is definitely the company to buy from. They offer premium versions on all of their games that are all protected with not only a warranty but a promise that If the product breaks or is damaged they will do everything in their power to replace or fix the problem. This bocce ball set is awesome and it is made with heavy duty material. I would definitely recommend this bocce ball set
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Durable, fun and excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I took these to my weeklong beach vacation over the Fourth of July. These were a big hit with all the guests! Everyone from the kids to the teens to the seniors in our group had fun playing in the sand! The balls held up very nice without chipping! We even had strangers watch us play and a few even joined in! My only complaint was that the shoulder strap buckle broke and it was poorly made.. now we have to carry it by the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J. Robati

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, heavy-duty product
customer_reviews.text: We got this to keep our kids in the backyard - so far, the adults haven't let them play! The balls are very sturdy and high-quality, the bag is very cushy and durable and it's a great value for the price. This would be an excellent housewarming gift.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bellomy

customer_reviews.title: This excellent set of Bocce Balls is just as the ad said.
customer_reviews.text: I have not found anything to dislike. The Bocce set arrived with no damage packaged in a nice carrying case and wrapped up to preclude any possible damage. These are very nice and feel good in your hand. They are not light and will play well. I used to play Bocce when I was a kid in Connecticut and always enjoyed the game. I can see me with a good glass of wine and some friends playing this game with this excellent set. I am now 81 so it should still be fun. I would not hesitate to recommend this Bocce set to any of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Thousands of Books Read

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: The whole family loves it. We have been playing with this for a few weeks with no issues. Lots of fun. Great bag to store and carry the set in.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B. Redmond

customer_reviews.title: Overall great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Received the order very quickly and just in time for the holiday weekend! Bocce balls are heavy and well made. They have stood up to a couple of badly aimed throws onto the asphalt with only some small scratches to show for it. The carrying case is well made and compact. Overall great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Coombs

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set. Balls have a great feel with just the right weight. We play on a crushed stone court that does scuff the balls but this was expected.
customer_reviews.author: OM18V

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with this bocce ball set!
customer_reviews.text: I received the bocce ball set quickly and was very impressed with the quality and look of the balls and carry-bag that came with it. It took me a little while to write this review because I wanted to actually use the set before I reviewed it. It held up great! We used it on the beach and there was no scratching or chipping to the finish, and the weight and size of the balls are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: debra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent finish on official size and weight balls. Very good case. Very satisfied with this set. Waxing with Meguiar's Yellow wax helps keep them clean and less scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well built
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the packaging, the bag (shoulder strap and vertical alignment), and the detailed instructions on how to play the game. Also, they donate a ball to kids in need for every review given. They're 'giving back'.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky C

customer_reviews.title: Bought for FUN !
customer_reviews.text: I had played with a group of "experienced" that needed another so they didn't default. I'd never played- but they walked me through- & I did ok ! ( they won !). So- I bought this to learn, play better & have more FUN !
customer_reviews.author: Greg Ward

customer_reviews.title: Solid Balls
customer_reviews.text: We have only played a few times. Great to take out in the yard and play. You don’t need a court. Casual gave the encourages interaction with others. You could easily maintain social distancing if you choose. Very nice quality. The fabric case is a dirt magnet.other than that excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: MartnGale

customer_reviews.title: Well crafted set of balls
customer_reviews.text: Primarily a beach player - had to replace a set that got pretty dinged up. As opposed to court playing, on the beach you can be tossing pretty high and every once in awhile you're going to get balls landing on each other and breaking some pieces off. These have held up wonderfully so far. The sturdy carry case is a total bonus. 100% recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sean Hamel

customer_reviews.title: The bag is sturdy, with inserts to keep the balls from smacking ...
customer_reviews.text: Just buy this set. It's the one you're looking for. The bag is sturdy, with inserts to keep the balls from smacking each other during transport; the pallino and bocce all feel like the right size; the measuring rope has little pokey things on the end to stick in the ground so you can pivot the string if you play with really bad aim and need long measurements. So far, playing on sandy grass (Florida backyard) I have seen minimal scuffing and no chipping, even with decent hits from other balls. Definitely recommend to the person who's looking for the set that won't need replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+++
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice balls. I bought them because this is what our local Bocce league uses for tournaments. They are made in China.
customer_reviews.author: W 6s

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Bocce ball set so I have nothing else to compare it to but I can say this seems to be well made.. it's also very heavy to carry the case around but the case also seems like it will hold up to the challenge of carrying this weight around for a good amount of time.. thanks !
customer_reviews.author: RemixedByGod

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They reside on the island or Roatan and are used at the beach by both young and old, males and females. The case and the balls are still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Islandman

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, don't use on the beach in 'deep' sand
customer_reviews.text: We have friends who have the same set without any issues, playing on any surface. We have had this set for ~1 month and we have a chipped ball. I think playing on the beach, when the balls can be 'stuck' the force of another ball can cause a chip... If we played on flat land where everything can move easily, I don't think these would have chipped. Loved (past tense) this product, very sad that one broke, and severely disappointed that I can't just purchase 1 ball for a replacement. So if you want a good option, but this, but don't play on thick sand - stick to 'flat' surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Game
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding! Was excited to get these in the mail so I could bring it to the beach. Great family time followed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Frotten

customer_reviews.title: I can't review these bocce balls because I was sent the wrong balls
customer_reviews.text: We were leaving for vacation last Thursday. I received a set of bocce balls on Wednesday afternoon and had no choice but to take the wrong balls on the trip. I had ordered 100mm balls. The balls I received were 90mm balls. We played with them on the beach and they are chipped in some places. I didn't have time to send them back to get the ones I ordered. So I have no idea how this set would have been. I
customer_reviews.author: Linda W.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Bocce Ball Set for the price
customer_reviews.text: The balls all seem high quality. After one use on the beach several balls had scratches and scuff marks but I believe that's normal. The case is nice but seems a little flimsy. Hopefully it will hold up over time. Overall for the money a good set.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only used this once at the beach. Seems to be holding up pretty well. There was some black sticky stuff that got all over the balls as we were playing. Besides that, no cracks or breaking thus far! Also, the packaging is aesthetically pleasing and could be a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Coolidge

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, heavy balls
customer_reviews.text: Solid balls! They weigh a ton! Smooth touch, not rough at all! Great gift for a lady!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and good value
customer_reviews.text: Truly regulation-- good, heavy weight. Nice carrying case with a shoulder strap. Didn't think about that until we opened it up, but that's a great idea. It's heavy, so you'll want the shoulder strap if you're carrying it any distance at all.
customer_reviews.author: patrick alan mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: This bocce set is as-advertised! The set includes a measuring rope, two sets of balls (green/maroon), a pallina, and retro-looking carrying case. It's about as straightforward of a purchase as one could want! Avoid concrete at all costs, otherwise, as durable as a bocce set would need to be!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fun game for most ages. My only comment is I wish the carrying case was some color that did not show dirt as much.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh M. Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a family activity that would be simple and enjoyable - something to promote everyone being together in our spacious backyard. This bocce set is the perfect solution! It is good quality, simple fun for everyone. My six year old grandson had a blast, and so did I!
customer_reviews.author: John Tolley

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Customer Service and Product Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets of Bocce Balls and was very happy with the quality. The only issue was that one of the carrying bags had a rather large rip in the seam which made the bag unusable. I notified the company and within 2 days I had a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Canthro

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The bocce set was very sturdy and is fun to play. The bag came with a broken zipper but I contacted customer service and they sent a replacement. Unfortunately it was lost in the mail and they have sent a second replacement. What amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Monica R.

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the finish
customer_reviews.text: Look no further this but she said is the one you want I purchased another set that was about $10 cheaper the balls were not regulation size and begin shipping after the first play. don’t bother with any other set!
customer_reviews.author: David Mark

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, set of bocce ball! Everything seems to be of good quality. Will purchase future yard games from gosports again! Try bocce ball!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Bocci set.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made bag, and the balls seem to be holding up very well. I would have preferred that the small ball be a bit larger - I need to keep the lawn a bit shorter so it doesn't get lost. Overall, a very good set. We have no real issues with these other than the small ball being too small, and I think the yellow ones look better.
customer_reviews.author: Jim T

customer_reviews.title: Nice well made set
customer_reviews.text: I gave this set to my son & his family -- they really enjoy it. They are of very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: paul wagner

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, much better quality vs the cheaper set I previously owned. I recommend spending the extra money on this set, you won't regret it
customer_reviews.author: Villerp19

customer_reviews.title: Bocce Ball carrying case poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The GoSports Bocce Ball Set - the bocce balls themselves are great, all are correct size with no unevenness in the balls. The carrying case on the other hand is very poorly made. Used the set for the first time last week and after putting the balls back in the case picked it up by the handle and the seam ripped. Expected a strongly constructed case for a bocce ball set.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Granted my family only played with these once, we had a blast and everything worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ush

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Started playing bocce so looking for set of our own Reviews were positive so got our own set Great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amber R Campa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set!
customer_reviews.text: This set is awesome! Very well made and lots of fun to play. The customer service is top notch as one of my balls got cracked do to kids throwing it in concrete. I reached out to them and they were very helpful and sent me a replacement, within days. I highly recommend this to new plays and advanced players.
customer_reviews.author: Choltrust

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for vacation and was a huge hit. Hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Pinard

customer_reviews.title: NICE SET
customer_reviews.text: Nice set and bag. It's heavy and a woman probably wouldn't want to carry it very far though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice balls with even weight. Feel really good in the hand. They fit perfectly in the high-quality sack.
customer_reviews.author: A.Leone

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Play every week with friends now that I have my own. Can play anytime, any place!
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a chance to use them yet, but they seem high quality and the bag with the padded separators is a very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Weak bag
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend using a different carrying case. The stitching is starting to break apart after 3 uses. The weight of the balls is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Rapp

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: nice quality. the balls are "heavy" (nice). the bag is fair at best but for the cost I'm not mad and overall very happy with the Bocce ball set. HIGHLY RECOMMENED.
customer_reviews.author: ilkietobuy

customer_reviews.title: Professional grade and built to alst.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and will be buying them to gift to friends looking for a Bocce ball set.
customer_reviews.author: Dain Niven

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect Bocce Ball set!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect Bocce Ball set! Do yourself a favor and do not order a cheaper one just to save money, the size and weight of these balls is perfect and they are so well constructed not a single one has shown any sign of scratching or chipping!
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: Bocce for everyone!!
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect! It's a great family gift because everyone can play! It's easy to take along on trips, and the balls are heavy and well made, We love it! Five Stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L. Wooldridge

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love to play me some bocce ball, and this is a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: K. B

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bocce set!
customer_reviews.text: This came so fast, even with standard shipping; took only two days. The set is great! I love the carrying case and the fact that it comes with a measuring cord. It came in very handy the first time I used it when there were some discrepancies with who was closer! I recommend this for anyone looking for a bocce set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and durable!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for someone, but we have played it at get together's. It is well made, and a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bocce Set - Perfect for weekend parties!
customer_reviews.text: We are big lawn gamers in the summer and Bocce is a new passion here. Great fun, excellent game for all ages. We purchased the Premium Official Size Set, very pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mason

customer_reviews.title: great bocce set up
customer_reviews.text: Would have gotten 5 stars if the bag were better. Otherwise a fine set!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I think Bocce balls are heavy so that adults can enjoy a game of their own!
customer_reviews.text: Great set, certainly worth the price. Looks and feels professional, and handled any abuse we put them through this past summer. Very resilient coating, and the case has held up well. Great feel and weight. Held up at the beach, on the grass, and in the dirt. Multiple striped pattern on balls allowed for more teams to play, which always makes the game more interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Greekspeare

customer_reviews.title: Never owning a set before, the balls do get ...
customer_reviews.text: Never owning a set before, the balls do get marred on hard surfaces. No chips or other complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: J V

customer_reviews.title: Arrived exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time, and in perfect condition. The balls are very heavy, and feel very sturdy. The case feels like it is sturdy enough to handle the weight of the balls. Very pleased with the product, and looking forward to getting my bocce game on with the family.
customer_reviews.author: K Eky

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: good quality, 100 mm too heavy for family use. 90 mm better weight.
customer_reviews.author: J. W.

customer_reviews.title: piece missing
customer_reviews.text: There was no White Pallino ball or Distance marker in the set. Will return
customer_reviews.author: Carrei

customer_reviews.title: Beach treat!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set!! These we will enjoy for a very long time!! Wonderful enhancement to our beach trips. The carry bag is hugely helpful!
customer_reviews.author: R mco

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice weight and finish. We purchased these for our community bocce court so they get regular usage.
customer_reviews.author: Robt

customer_reviews.title: A really nice yard game addition to backyard BBQs
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality Bocce set! A really nice yard game addition to backyard BBQs.
customer_reviews.author: nailbiter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I only play once in a blue moon when headed to the beach, or when having some friends over. The quality is great, the size and weight are legitimate. Great set to keep around in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: OnlyLlama

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Excellent product. Have fun playing it with my husband. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela C Kauzlarich

customer_reviews.title: Great Bocce Ball Set
customer_reviews.text: Very, very nice set. Great Quality. Bought one for myself and as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: roni

customer_reviews.title: They use it in their backyard and it keeps him going to take
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my grandchildren as a gift they seem to be satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game comes with a nice carrier bag, game play rules, and a measuring string.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Katie

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for the price! Bocce is an easy game to play anywhere,so we have a great time playing in the back yard or at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Msknottyknits

customer_reviews.title: They feel right and the carrier helps alot
customer_reviews.text: Close to regulation size and weight. We have enjoyed hours of play.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. The case gets a bit grungy because ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. The case gets a bit grungy because it's light colored...who cares? Enjoy at a good price. Bocce balls are quite heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Quality Set
customer_reviews.text: More fun that I imagined. Was a big hit with guests.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set. Great price. Not sure why the bag is white!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, beautifully packed, ages 22 43 and 73 all enjoyed playing.
customer_reviews.author: BG Europe

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good set that is highly recommended. The balls are a good weight and the measuring rope is very handy, and the case is well made and sturdy. The perfect bocce set for intermediate players such as myself.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: For $60 I was hoping for a sturdy set, the set my dad has been using ...
customer_reviews.text: I grew up playing bocce with my dad's set, and wanted one for myself since I moved away. I've used this set twice on a beach and there are already signs of wear and tear, discoloration where the balls have hit each other. For $60 I was hoping for a sturdy set, the set my dad has been using for 20+ years has no nicks or discoloration from use. Maybe companies just don't make durable bocce sets anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!! cant wait to play
customer_reviews.text: beautiful!! cant wait to play, yes they get scuff marks. it will even send a paper saying it will. do not let other reviews not discourage you from buying this. as long as you do not go bananas and throw them at each other hard, you will do fine.
customer_reviews.author: Eliot Brown

customer_reviews.title: Mismatched balls!
customer_reviews.text: Our set came with mismatched balls! Now only 3 people can appropriately play instead of 4.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, Nice-looking Set
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful set, as good-looking as advertised. Arrived quickly and without hassle. Am giving this as a gift and I think the recipient is going to be very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: family fun
customer_reviews.text: balls are heavy and seem like they will take some abuse.
customer_reviews.author: chad mccartney

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: We gave the GoSpprts Bocce set as a gift. Our son-in-law really likes it. He liked that it had a case & the quality seemed good
customer_reviews.author: Afton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best bocce balls i've ever had. I whup my dad every time we play...
customer_reviews.author: DLCouch

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set to play with family. It is great. Feels good in the hand. Love the bag it comes in to hold everything.
customer_reviews.author: Cwood

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality set of bocce balls. We play on the beach, so the quality makes a big difference. The measuring rope works really well and the case is nice quality. The case is also a nice shape so that it takes up less room in our overcrowded garage section for toys!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra money and get this set with case
customer_reviews.author: Heather H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Plays well on the beach and grass. The measuring rope is definitely handy.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best game set
customer_reviews.text: This is the best set you can buy I looked around town good price and fast delivery recommended highly
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Really brings the whole family together! Cant wait for the summer to get eh most use out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Great solid set. Very durable and fun for all ages. Love the case.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Julianna

customer_reviews.title: The sack they come in is also nice.
customer_reviews.text: I've had my hands on a fair share of balls and these are top notch. The sack they come in is also nice.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, excellent product, fast service!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy in my choice of seller for this bocci ball set. It arrived exactly as described and had been packaged perfectly for shipping. Delivery was prompt with gracious follow up from the seller. Highly recommend! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Robbi

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set. The balls are regulation size and weight ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. The balls are regulation size and weight so there are no suprises with that. The bag is well made with padded dividers between the balls. I've used the set a few times now (mainly at the beach) and have gotten compliments on it each time. I have owned two other bocce sets and was frustrated either with construction, or durability. I've only had this set a short time but I'm really happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jhow

customer_reviews.title: Quality set
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the delivery and the quality of the product. Wasn't sure it would be there by Christmas but they made it happen and my brother in law loves the set due to it's quality. We've played a lot of bocce on cheap sets and this is definitely a huge step above those.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Gates

product_meta.title: GoSports 100mm Regulation Bocce Set with 8 Balls, Pallino, Case and Measuring Rope - Premium Official Size Set
product_meta.description: The Go Sports 100mm Bocce Set is a full size premium set for bocce enthusiasts. The set includes 8 throwing balls, including the traditional colors of 4 Red (2 Circle Cut, 2 Square Cut), 4 Green (2 Circle Cut, 2 Square Cut and a 45mm white Pallino. This classic color combination allows anywhere from 2 to 4 Players to compete at one time. The set can be used both for official courted Bocce as well as Free Play Bocce. Each ball is made from high quality poly-resin to provide a high gloss, defect free finish. Each ball weighs 2 pound, 5 ounces. The set includes a high quality canvas carrying case with shoulder strap so you can take your Bocce game on the road and then store it without losing any pieces. Also included are official rules and a measuring device to help settle any close calls.
feature_bullets: Premium case: Includes premium canvas carrying case will ball dividers and shoulder strap
Regulation markings: 8 high gloss balls with 4 red (2 square cut, 2 circle cut) and 4 green (2 square cut, 2 circle cut) and 45 millimeter white Pallino
Premium construction: Compare against other low quality brands that use cheap resin leading to cloudy finishes
Official size: Complete set of 100 millimeter (3.94 inch) Bocce balls weighing 2 pounds 5 ounce each, (4 green + 4 red with circle and square markings); Beware of other sets that use smaller balls

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
